title: Gran's focaccia with tomato and anchovies
ingredients: ['4 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed', '225ml (8 fl oz) reserved potato water', '900g (2 lb) plain flour', '1 tablespoon salt', '10g (1/4 oz) fresh (compressed) yeast', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (50g) tin anchovy fillets, chopped', 'dried oregano to taste']
